qas.question: Who oversees a Pharmacy Technician in the UK?
With what body must a pharmacy technician register?
What is a main duty of the GPhC?

answers.text: regulates the practice of pharmacists and pharmacy technicians
governing body for pharmacy health care professionals
regulates the practice of pharmacists and pharmacy technicians

qas.question: What type of professional is a Pharmacy Technician considered to be?
What types of responsibilities might a pharmacy technician have?

answers.text: manage the pharmacy department and specialised areas in pharmacy practice
manage the pharmacy department and specialised areas

qas.question: Who is not required to oversee a Pharmacy Technician in the UK?
With what body must a pharmacy not be allowed to register?

plausible_answers.text: regulates the practice of pharmacists and pharmacy technicians

qas.question: What is a secondary duty of the GPhC?

plausible_answers.text: manage the pharmacy department and specialised areas in pharmacy practice

qas.question: What types of responsibilities might a pharmacy technician not be responsible for?

context: A Pharmacy Technician in the UK is considered a <a3_0><a3_2>health care professional<a3_2/><a3_0/> and often does not work under the direct supervision of a pharmacist (if employed in a hospital pharmacy) but instead is supervised and managed by <a0_0><a0_2><b5_0>other <a0_1>senior pharmacy technicians<b5_0/><a0_2/><a0_1/><a0_0/>. In the UK the role of a PhT has grown and responsibility has been passed on to them to <a4_0><a4_1><a4_2><b8_0>manage the pharmacy department<a4_2/> and specialised areas<a4_1/> in pharmacy practice<b8_0/><a4_0/> allowing pharmacists the time to specialise in their expert field as medication consultants spending more time working with patients and in research. A pharmacy technician once qualified has to register as a professional on <a1_0><b6_0>the <a1_1><a1_2>General Pharmaceutical Council (GPhC)<a1_1/> register<b6_0/><a1_2/><a1_0/>. The GPhC is the <a2_1>governing body for <a3_1>pharmacy health care<a3_1/> professionals<a2_1/> and this is who <a2_0><a2_2><b7_0>regulates the practice of pharmacists and pharmacy technicians<b7_0/><a2_2/><a2_0/>.
